noProviderAlert.title: No providers available
noProviderAlert.desc: Liquidity providers on Tor network can take a long time to respond or all your providers are offline.

pinModalUnlock.title: Unlock your seed
pinModalUnlock.desc: Enter your secret PIN to send {{sendAmount}} {{sendUnit}} and receive {{receiveAmount}} {{receiveUnit}}.

showMnemonic.title: Show mnemonic
showMnemonic.desc: Display the secret mnemonic stored in your device's secure storage.

newPin.title: Set new pin
newPin.desc: Change the secure PIN using to encrypt your wallet's seed.

deleteMnemonic.title: Delete mnemonic
deleteMnemonic.desc: Definitively removes your seed from this device. Be extremely careful, after deletion it will be impossible to retrieve your key from tdex-app.
deleteMnemonic.pageDescDesc: Clicking on "Delete" will delete your mnemonic on this device. Be sure to back it up!
deleteMnemonic.error: Error: your key has not been deleted. Please contact support.

explorers.pageDescDesc: Select a preset of backend APIs Electrs-compatible and frontend explorers Esplora-compatible or enter custom compatible endpoints.

deepRestoration.gapLimit: Choose the gap limit for the account discovery
deepRestoration.scan: Scan the Liquid Network up to {{rangeValue}} consecutive unused addresses. If new funds are discovered, they will show up in your balance.
deepRestoration.pinDesc: Enter your PIN to start scanning

claim.pageDescDesc: Here you can manually claim your deposit in case the process was interrupted abruptly. Please only use this section if your deposit has 102 confirmations or more. You can only claim a deposit made from this application and this set of keys. To claim, please insert the BTC address below.
claim.pinDesc: Enter your secret PIN to claim funds

language.descriptionContent: You can choose your favorite language

operation.noTxs: You don't have any transactions yet

backup.title: Back up your secret phrase
backup.desc1: Your secret 12-words recovery phrase is the only way to recover your funds if you lose access to your wallet.
backup.desc2: Write it down safely and store it in a secure location.

withdraw.pinDesc: Enter your secret PIN to send
withdraw.placeholder: Paste address here or scan QR code

tradeHistory.noTrades: You don't have any trades transactions. They will appear here.
